question: "Which pair of films starred Uma Thurman as ""the bride"", Daryl Hannah as her arch-nemesis and Lucy Liu as ""Cottonmouth""?"
vanilla_rag_result: The pair of films that starred Uma Thurman as "the Bride," Daryl Hannah as her arch-nemesis, and Lucy Liu as "Cottonmouth" are "Kill Bill: Volume 1" (2003) and "Kill Bill: Volume 2" (2004).
